name: docker-prune
description: Remove unused Docker objects to free up disk space

examples.description: System-wide cleanup of all unused objects

object_types: images - Remove dangling and unused images
networks - Remove networks not used by containers
volumes - Remove volumes not used by containers

options.description: Remove all unused images, not just dangling ones
Prune volumes as well (system prune only)

filter_examples: until=2021-01-01 - Objects older than specific date
safety_warnings: ‚ö†Ô∏è  Always backup important data before pruning volumes
‚ö†Ô∏è  Review what will be deleted before confirming
notes: üí° Regular pruning helps maintain clean Docker environment
üîß System prune is safest - doesn't remove volumes by default
üìä Shows space reclaimed after operation completes
‚ö° Use filters to prune objects based on age or labels
